languages.text: "Все так. Ты мне не нужен. Но не волнуйся, я учел и этот исход. Тавриск, ты готов?" {n}Усмехается Блеф, явно наслаждаясь своей мнимой... или реальной властью?{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Все так. Ты мне не нужен. Но не волнуйся, я учел и этот исход". {n}Усмехается Блеф, явно наслаждаясь своей мнимой... или реальной властью?{/n}

languages.text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все так. Ты мне не нужен. Но не волнуйся, я учел и этот исход. Тавриск, ты готов?" {n}Усмехается Блеф, явно наслаждаясь своей мнимой... или реальной властью?{/n}

"Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

languages.text: “没错，我根本不需要你。不过别担心，这一步也在我的计划之内。准备好了吗，塔夫瑞克？”{n}闹闹得意洋洋地笑着，很显然，他很享受他想象出来的力量……还是说，他的力量其实是货真价实的？{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，我根本不需要你。不过别担心，这一步也在我的计划之内。准备好了吗，塔夫瑞克？”{n}闹闹得意洋洋地笑着，很显然，他很享受他想象出来的力量……还是说，他的力量其实是货真价实的？{/n}

languages.text: «Exactamente. No le necesito. Pero no se preocupe, que también había previsto esta contingencia. Tavrisk, ¿todo listo?». {n}Farol sonríe muy pagado de sí mismo; es evidente que disfruta de su poder imaginario... ¿o quizá sea real?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Exactamente. No le necesito. Pero no se preocupe, que también había previsto esta contingencia. Tavrisk, ¿todo listo?». {n}Farol sonríe muy pagado de sí mismo; es evidente que disfruta de su poder imaginario... ¿o quizá sea real?{/n}

languages.text: "Kesinlikle. Sana ihtiyacım yok. Fakat endişelenme, bunu da planladım. Hazır mısın Tavrisk?" {n}Hayallerinin veya gerçekte olanların keyfini çıkardığı belli olan Kurusıkı sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle. Sana ihtiyacım yok. Fakat endişelenme, bunu da planladım. Hazır mısın Tavrisk?" {n}Hayallerinin veya gerçekte olanların keyfini çıkardığı belli olan Kurusıkı sırıtıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「その通り。お前はいらないんだ。しかし、心配するな、これも計画の内だ。タヴリスク、準備は？」{n}ブラフは薄ら笑いを浮かべ、明らかに自分の想像力を楽しんでいる。それとも現実か？{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。お前はいらないんだ。しかし、心配するな、これも計画の内だ」{n}ブラフは薄ら笑いを浮かべ、明らかに自分の想像力を楽しんでいる。それとも現実か？{/n}

languages.text: « Exactement. Je n'ai pas besoin de vous. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai tout prévu. Tavrisk, êtes-vous prêt ? » {n}Bluff sourit de toutes ses dents, manifestement ravi de pouvoir faire usage de son pouvoir imaginaire. Ou serait-il réel... ?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Exactement. Je n'ai pas besoin de vous. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai tout prévu. Tavrisk, êtes-vous prêt ? » {n}Bluff sourit de toutes ses dents, manifestement ravi de pouvoir faire usage de son pouvoir imaginaire. Ou serait-il réel... ?{/n}

languages.text: "Ganz genau. Ich brauche Euch nicht. Aber keine Sorge, auch das habe ich eingeplant." Tavrisk, seid Ihr bereit?" {n}Bluff grinst überheblich, offenbar genießt er seine imaginäre Macht – oder ist sie real?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly. I don't need you. But don't worry, I've planned for this as well. Tavrisk, are you ready?" {n}Bluff smirks, clearly enjoying his imaginary power — or is it real?{/n}
